articles.author: CBC News
articles.title: Indiana 1st state to ban most abortions after the overturning of Roe v. Wade | CBC News
articles.description: Indiana has become the first state in the U.S. to approve abortion restrictions since the Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade, as the Republican governor quickly signed a near-total ban on the procedure shortly after lawmakers approved it.
articles.content: Indiana on Friday became the first state in the U.S. to approve abortion restrictions since the Supreme Court overturned the 1973 landmark Roe v. Wade case, as the Republican governor quickly signed … [+5616 chars]

articles.author: Amy Cheng
articles.title: Indiana passes near-total abortion ban, the first state to do so post-Roe
articles.description: The bill, which includes exceptions for rape and incest cases, was signed into law by Gov. Eric Holcomb (R) soon after passing Indiana's Republican-controlled Senate.
